person:biography.personal-details:content: Sabine Baumgartner is Associated Professor for Bioanalytics at the University of Natural Resources and Life Sciences Vienna (BOKU) at the Department for Agrobiotechnology Tulln. Her main research focuses in general on Food Chemistry and Food Safety with special emphasis on immunoanalytical and proteomic approaches for the determination and detection of proteins in food, rapid test system development on the base of immunoanalytical methods and mass spectrometric methods for the determination of chemical and allergenic contaminants in food and feed as well as antibody development (polyclonal and monoclonal approach) and cell culture techniques for the development of monoclonal antibodies.
